channel.title: Hamachi Server Issue
channel.description: So I just got this ZenithScape server up with no issues (it's like a 728 server). And at the moment I'm just getting it up with a couple of friends. And we've all been on, but occasionally for them it gets stuck at 1% loading. But it does generally turn out to work. So I was wondering if any of you guys new what it could be. It only seems to happen after ME compiling (as I'm the host and it's on my IP). Yes I'm a newb D: Please help?

item.title: Hamachi Server Issue
item.dc:creator: @Haro123 Haro123
item.description:
@Haro123 wrote:

So I just got this ZenithScape server up with no issues (it’s like a 728 server). And at the moment I’m just getting it up with a couple of friends. And we’ve all been on, but occasionally for them it gets stuck at 1% loading. But it does generally turn out to work. So I was wondering if any of you guys new what it could be. It only seems to happen after ME compiling (as I’m the host and it’s on my IP). Yes I’m a newb D: Please help?
